places_to_visit.name: Baga Beach
places_to_visit.description: A popular beach known for water sports and vibrant nightlife.

places_to_visit.name: Fort Aguada
places_to_visit.description: A 17th-century Portuguese fort with a lighthouse and views of the Arabian Sea.

restaurants.name: Fisherman's Wharf
restaurants.description: A famous seafood restaurant with a scenic view of the river.

famous_foods.name: Goan Fish Curry
famous_foods.description: A spicy, tangy fish curry made with coconut milk and local spices.

hotels.name: Taj Exotica
hotels.description: A luxury resort offering stunning views of the Arabian Sea.
